title: There was an error with your download.
body:
Whenever i try downloading a replay for the pass 2 days it would always say "There was an error with your download. Click here to try again". I every time i click the button it would show me the same message and nothing would download. I have tried running my client on administrator and it still doesn't work. Sometimes i lets me download the replay after the 5-7th time of trying again

Please Help
